Brazil first lady to sue Musk's X over hacked accountBrazilian first lady Rosangela 'Janja' Lula da Silva said on Tuesday she will sue Elon Musk-owned social media platform X, formerly known as Twitter, after having her account hacked last week. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 12:08:43 GMT NKMK3OUKMRPJRJQGYTWPRBFBJI https://www.reuters.com/technology/cybersecurity/brazil-first-lady-sue-musks-x-over-hacked-account-2023-12-19/Reuters技术网络安全
Turkey's Erdogan says EU will 'stall' Ukraine, Moldova accessionTurkish President Tayyip Erdogan was on Tuesday cited as saying the European Union would stall Ukraine and Moldova's accession to the EU, adding that Ankara had long earned the right to join the bloc but was being kept waiting for political reasons. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 12:07:37 GMT MMYZFJCPQJN7TORINNXX4RS2LQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/turkeys-erdogan-says-eu-will-stall-ukraine-moldova-accession-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
UK warns of deteriorating security in Red Sea, Royal Navy ship joins taskforceBritain warned that the security situation in the Red Sea was deteriorating and ballistic missile and drone attacks were an increased threat, as it agreed for a Royal Navy Destroyer to join a U.S.-led operation to safeguard commerce in the region. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 12:00:37 GMT QN43SUZWNBLLPK6S3WJ3LKT7AI https://www.reuters.com/world/uk-warns-deteriorating-security-red-sea-royal-navy-ship-joins-taskforce-2023-12-19/Reuters世界
Julian Assange's 'final' appeal against U.S. extradition to be held in FebruaryWikiLeaks' founder Julian Assange's possible final legal challenge to stop his extradition from Britain to the United States where he is wanted on criminal charges will be held at London's High Court in February, his supporters said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 11:57:14 GMT WEDP5MVW6ZLZ5K7K3TY5GAEFIQ https://www.reuters.com/world/julian-assanges-final-appeal-against-us-extradition-be-held-february-2023-12-19/Reuters世界
Ambrey: Unsuccessful boarding attempt west of Yemen's AdenBritish maritime security firm Ambrey said on Tuesday it received information of a potential boarding attempt 17 miles west of Yemen's Aden port city, adding that the attack was unsuccessful and all crew are safe. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 11:45:49 GMT USTFENLPEVNIXLBWI243XR4MX4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/ambrey-unsuccessful-boarding-attempt-west-yemens-aden-2023-12-19/Reuters世界中东
Polish parliament to appeal for public media and court reformsPoland's new parliament will debate on Tuesday two resolutions calling for the restoration of public media impartiality and credibility and for changes in the National Council of the Judiciary (NCJ), its speaker said. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 11:41:56 GMT 6KJL5LCWBVJVJGBMVNG4XDVQGU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-parliament-appeal-public-media-court-reforms-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
German court orders partial repeat of Berlin's 2021 electionGermany's constitutional court on Tuesday ordered a partial repeat of the 2021 federal election in Berlin in a ruling that could slightly impact the composition of parliament but is not expected to affect the ruling coalition's majority. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 11:32:25 GMT MHJGRE77CBIOLGI6CEVHTGSG3A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/german-court-orders-partial-repeat-berlins-2021-election-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Chileans reject conservative draft constitution as too extremeChile's two failed attempts at rewriting a constitution have signaled a desire for moderation among voters, who once again rejected a proposal drafted by right-wing legislators on Sunday considered too extreme, according to analysts and voters. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 11:07:09 GMT 2ZEHQTZE5FLX5BCD44OHDLPLMY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/chileans-reject-conservative-draft-constitution-too-extreme-2023-12-19/Natalia Miranda, Lucinda Elliott, Alexander Villegas世界美洲
Erdogan says signals from US, Canada may help Turkey move on Sweden NATO bidTurkish President Tayyip Erdogan was quoted on Tuesday as saying that positive developments on the U.S. sale of F-16 fighter jets to Ankara, and on Canada's arms embargo, would help Turkey's parliament move toward ratifying Sweden's NATO membership bid. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 11:05:40 GMT 6T6M2ZYAVFNP3ADDLTCUD62LVA https://www.reuters.com/world/erdogan-says-signals-us-canada-could-help-turkey-move-sweden-nato-bid-2023-12-19/Reuters世界
Denmark, U.S. reach defence agreementDenmark has reached a defence agreement with the United States that will allow U.S. soldiers and military equipment to be based on Danish soil, the country's Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 10:53:08 GMT EUIG74QGSBLVJEOHNNLFA67BME https://www.reuters.com/world/denmark-us-reach-defence-agreement-2023-12-19/Reuters世界
Who are Yemen’s Houthis and why are they attacking Red Sea ships?The Iran-aligned Houthis of Yemen are playing an escalating role in the Middle East, attacking shipping in the Red Sea and firing drones and missiles at Israel in a campaign they say aims to support Palestinians in the Gaza war. UN agencies voice anger at Gaza hospital attacks, depravationU.N. officials voiced anger and disbelief on Tuesday about the situation in Gaza hospitals, where injured people do not have basic supplies and children recovering from amputations are being killed in the ongoing conflict. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 10:24:03 GMT KZINJNS35RISHLJ2FOW2CCOSRM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-agcies-voice-anger-attacks-gaza-hospitals-2023-12-19/Reuters世界中东
Explainer: US, Asian allies launch system to track North Korea missiles in real-timeSouth Korea, the United States and Japan said on Tuesday they have activated a new system to detect and assess North Korea's missile launches in real-time. Iceland volcano erupts, missing fishing town of Grindavik for nowLava from a large volcanic eruption in Iceland appeared to be flowing away from the only town in the area, offering hope that homes and lives would be spared even though the seismic activity could last months, officials said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 07:43:41 GMT YXXIA4L2MVKKNANGP5JRKHMRWI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/large-icelandic-volcano-eruption-misses-local-town-2023-12-19/Jacob Gronholt-Pedersen, Tom Little世界欧洲
Shippers mask positions, weigh options amid Red Sea attacksA number of container ships are anchored in the Red Sea and others have turned off tracking systems as traders adjust routes and prices in response to maritime attacks by Yemen's Iran-aligned Houthis on the world's main East-West trade route. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 07:22:56 GMT 4WPTDGZBHRITTCN6W5FZGAYRRM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/shippers-mask-positions-weigh-options-amid-red-sea-attacks-2023-12-19/Florence Tan, Lisa Barrington世界中东
Israel pounds Gaza, Houthis vow more Red Sea attacksIsrael kept pounding the shattered Gaza Strip on Tuesday while Yemen's pro-Palestinian Houthi movement vowed to defy a U.S.-led naval mission and keep hitting Israeli targets in the Red Sea. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 23:52:02 GMT 6NF7X2O6IZIPNM64HF7XN7DDNI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/joint-patrols-guard-ships-response-attacks-by-houthis-backing-palestinians-2023-12-18/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Bassam Masoud世界中东
US launches Red Sea force as ships reroute to avoid attacksDefense Secretary Lloyd Austin on Tuesday said the United States was leading a multinational operation to safeguard commerce in the Red Sea as attacks by Iran-backed Yemeni Houthi militants forced more major shipping companies to reroute. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 22:34:39 GMT SQCWCA3E6ZJTHDRUZQGZYT4ETA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-launches-new-multinational-operation-safeguard-red-sea-commerce-2023-12-18/Phil Stewart世界中东
Homes collapse as earthquake kills more than 100 in China's rural GansuA magnitude-6.2 earthquake struck one of China's poorest regions just before midnight on Monday, killing at least 127 people, injuring hundreds and bringing down mud houses in remote villages that never stood a chance. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 16:15:04 GMT KRMKMBYCSRM2RFHPPGYYAFHFGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/magnitude-61-earthquake-strikes-qinghai-china-emsc-2023-12-18/Liz Lee, Qiaoyi Li, Ryan Woo世界中国
Hanukkah brings light to Germany's Jews facing surge in antisemitismA German chancellor for the first time kindled the first flame of the giant Hanukkah Menorah in front of Berlin's landmark Brandenburg Gate on Thursday in a sign of solidarity with Jewish people two months after the Hamas attacks. Thu, 07 Dec 2023 11:38:30 GMT AHWOOZRVIZID7PSBTUH2M43XW4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hanukkah-brings-light-germanys-jews-faceing-surge-antisemitism-2023-12-07/Thomas Escritt, Sarah Marsh世界欧洲
